rules_text: Exile up to one target white permanent. If you do, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a white card not named Remake Realities. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all cards revealed this way that weren't cast on the bottom of your library in a random order. Repeat this process for blue, black, red, and green. Exile this spell.
flavor_text: [i]Five worlds, six sparks, one restored vision.[/i]
